Hi Jens,

List is an interface and interfaces, don't have any implementatio=
ns.
And what to test, if there is nothing to do?
So you have to instanciate=
 a real implementation to run a test.

Use the template method pattern for =
your testcases. You can find a
brief description at
http://tech.groups.yaho=
o.com/group/junit/message/20223

If you implement this testcase for each of=
 your subclasses you are
able to instantly test the correct implementation =
of each subclass.

Moreover: if you publish your interface, also promote yo=
ur abstract
testcase. Maybe the users who implement your interface want to =
test
their concrete implementations as well.

Martin
